comments:
Hi,

i'm using eclipse 3.0.2 and tomcat 4.1.30 (JRE 1.4.2_06) and when I call my jsp
page I get the following error message:

the classpath has been truncated after 990 characters, I think this is the cause
of the problem, but I don't know how to fix it.

it's the first time that I get this error type, but it's the first time that I
use the Struts framework in my project too...

*** Bug 102036 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This is not related to Eclipse. Try Google:

http://www.google.ca/search?q=executeExternalCompile+DefaultCompilerAdapter+Java13CommandLauncher+%22java.io.IOException%3A+CreateProcess%3A%22
